# zoterro

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Zoterro is a simple R client to Zotero web API (ver. 3).




## Installation

Development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r install, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mbojan/zoterro")
```
